field.name: tapatalk_directory
field.label: Tapatalk Plugin Directory
field.description: Advanced Use Only. Change it only if you did rename the Tapatalk plugin directory. And the default value is 'mobiquo'. If you have installed Tapatalk plugin in different directory, you will also need to apply the same settings in Tapatalk Forum Owner Area at http://tapatalk.com/forum_owner.php

field.name: tapatalk_push_key
field.label: Push Key
field.description: Optional but Recommended. Push Key helps us to verify the origin of push notification requests we received from your server, you can obtain this value from Tapatalk Forum Owner Area. This field is optional but very helpful to make sure your Push requests are delivered to your member's mobile devices.

field.name: app_banner_message
field.label: BYO App Banner Message
field.description: E.g. "Follow {your_forum_name} with {app_name} for [os_platform]". Do not change the [os_platform] tag as it is displayed dynamically based on user's device platform.

field.name: app_ios_id
field.label: BYO iOS App ID
field.description: Enter your BYO product ID in Apple App Store, to be used on iOS device.

field.name: app_android_id
field.label: Android Product ID
field.description: Enter your BYO App ID from Google Play, to be used on Android device. E.g. "com.quoord.tapatalkpro.activity"

field.name: app_kindle_url
field.label: Kindle Fire Product URL
field.description: Enter your BYO App URL from Amazon App Store, to be used on Kindle Fire device. E.g. "http://www.amazon.com/gp/mas/dl/android?p=com.quoord.tapatalkpro.activity"
